metadata.title: AWS Developer Associate DVA-C02 Practice Questions

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Development with AWS Services (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: DynamoDB Streams is a key concept in Development with AWS Services. This domain covers topics essential for the AWS Developer Associate exam.

questions.question: A professional is tasked with develop code for aws lambda. What should be the first step?
options: Assess the current state and identify requirements
Document the findings in a report
questions.explanation: The first step in any development with aws services task is to assess the current state before implementing changes.

questions.question: Which concept in Development with AWS Services is most closely related to use data stores in application development?
options: Development with AWS Services governance and oversight
Development with AWS Services implementation and operations
Development with AWS Services assessment and testing
Development with AWS Services risk management
questions.explanation: Use data stores in application development falls under the implementation and operations aspect of Development with AWS Services.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Development with AWS Services (Domain 1)?
options: API Gateway Stages and Usage Plans
questions.explanation: SNS Fan-Out Pattern is a key concept in Development with AWS Services. This domain covers topics essential for the AWS Developer Associate exam.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key consideration when working with develop code for aws lambda?
options: Following industry best practices and standards
Reducing the number of team members involved
questions.explanation: When working with develop code for aws lambda, following industry best practices ensures consistent and reliable results.

questions.question: Which of the following best describes the purpose of "Use data stores in application development" in Development with AWS Services?

To evaluate compliance with development with aws services standards
questions.explanation: Use data stores in application development is a key objective in Development with AWS Services. Understanding this concept is essential for the exam.
